I need some help with this one. It doesn't work . When i click the GSGameExe.exe i get this error "The application was unable to star correctly (0xc0150002). Click OK to close the application". And when i click the GSGameExe_DX9.exe i get this "The application has failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect. Please see the application event log or use the command-line sxstrace.exe tool for more detail". What can i do ? Is this framework or visual c++ problem?
